name: Moore, Exrx., Appellant, v. Esso Standard Oil Company of Pennsylvania et al.
name_abbreviation: Moore v. Esso Standard Oil Co.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Moore, Exrx., Appellant, v. Esso Standard Oil Company of Pennsylvania et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
pee Cueiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Sweney.
opinions.author: pee Cueiam,

attorneys: B. Winfield Baile, with him George W. Thompson, for appellant.
D. Malcolm Hodge, E. P. Balderston,Jr., and Hodge, Hodge & Balderston, for appellees, were not heard.
casebody.head_matter:
Moore, Exrx., Appellant, v. Esso Standard Oil Company of Pennsylvania et al.
Argued January 12, 1950.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
March 20, 1950:
B. Winfield Baile, with him George W. Thompson, for appellant.
D. Malcolm Hodge, E. P. Balderston,Jr., and Hodge, Hodge & Balderston, for appellees, were not heard.
